resources.string: Noch kein Konto? Geben Sie nur Ihren Wunschnamen ein und es erledigt sich damit praktisch automatisch.

Hinweis: Unfertige Dateien werden als Fragment in dem Ordner "Soulseek Incomplete" so lange gespeichert bis die Übertragung vollständig ist. Danach wird die Datei im Ordner "Soulseek Complete" abgelegt. 

Dies ermöglicht (1) Downloads fortzusetzen wo sie plötzlich aussetzten (2) große Dateien herunterzuladen, ohne Speicherfehler. (das spart auch Arbeitsspeicher). 

Wenn Sie dies deaktivieren dann können und werden unfertige Dateien den Arbeitspeicher belegen bis sie im Ordner "Soulseek Complete" abgelegt werden können.

Dieser Dienst ermöglicht es Seeker, im Hintergrund zu laufen. 

Dies ist notwendig, um auf Suchanfragen zu reagieren (falls freigegeben), Chat-Nachrichten zu empfangen und die Ergebnisse der Wunschliste im Hintergrund zu erhalten.


Für Downloads oder Uploads im Hintergrund ist er jedoch nicht erforderlich – dafür gibt es bereits einen eigenen Dienst, der immer ausgeführt wird.


Der einzige Nachteil ist, dass dadurch der Akkuverbrauch steigen kann. In diesem Fall kann man den Dienst standardmäßig deaktivieren und nur bei Bedarf ausführen.

This setting allows Seeker to accept incoming connections, so that we can connect to clients without open ports. 

What this means in practice is that as long as we are successfully listening (indicated via "Check Status") we will recieve more search results, be able to download from more people, upload to more people, etc. 

Seeker will attempt to automatically forward ports via UPnP (this is what the official desktop client does). If you are NOT on Wifi it will not work, if you are on a VPN please search how to port forward for your specific VPN, if your router is not UPnP enabled then you must manually forward port.

A few things to note about sharing files. When an upload directory is first set, the app has to read through the files and parse them in a way that is easy for subsequent searches and browse requests. This can take up to a few minutes. Make sure that the files that you are sharing do not have any private or sensitive information in them (basically use the same judgement you would for the official soulseek client).

Privileges allow one to support the Soulseek creator (Nir) and the central server which this app depends on. 

It also allows one to get queued ahead of non privileged users in the download queue. 

Note: any donations do not go to the creator of this unofficial android client, Seeker. I do not currently accept donations.
Keine Nachrichten. Drücken Sie + um loszulegen.
Liste der verfügbaren Chaträume wird angefordert. Bitte warten...

This tab is used to browse a user\'s directory tree.\n\nTo get started perform a search in the search tab or tap the \'+\'.

Please Choose a Download Directory (Default is the Music Folder)

FEHLER: Kein Dateimanager installiert, der ein Bild auswählen kann. Bitte installieren Sie eines.
FEHLER: Kein Dateimanager installiert, der ein Verzeichnis auswählen kann. Bitte installieren Sie einen.

ERROR - No file manager installed that is capable of choosing a directory. Please install one. If your device does not implement OPEN_DOCUMENT_TREE intent, please install Seeker from Fdroid (IzzyOnDroid Repo) which has the Manage External Storage permission.
Bild ist zu groß. Bitte wählen Sie ein kleineres Bild. (<5 MB).
Benutzerliste leer. Bitte Benutzer zur Benutzerliste hinzufügen.

Seeker ist ein kostenloser und quelloffener Soulseek-Client für Android. Niemals wird er Werbung oder kostenpflichtige Funktionen enthalten.

Bitte hilft mir, Seeker hier zu übersetzen. Der Quellcode ist hier.

Version: {0}.

The standard way of requesting folder access does not always persist permissions. If you find Seeker reprompting for Download Folder or Shared Folder access, this button will request the old style permissions which will always persist.

This function requires the Fdroid IzzyDroid version of Seeker (Download Here). The Google Play Store does not allow applications to request this permission.
Must be logged in to get directory contents
No uploads currently, as you upload files they will appear here
No uploads currently, you are not sharing any files
No uploads currently, failed to set up shares

Limit number of concurrent downloads. ex. if max concurrent is 1 and you download 2 folders from different users, the second folder will begin once the first is complete. This can be useful for those with low bandwidth, to not tie up the upload queues of other users and to completed more recent downloads faster.
This will clear the no longer needed files in the incomplete folder. Seeker tries to do this by default, but sometimes it will fail and so this button can be used to free up files / space.

This will save diagnostic information to a text file named \"seeker_diagnostics.txt\" which will be located in the root of the selected download folder. \n\nThis can be useful to send to the dev for the purposes of troubleshooting issues. If the issues are of a networking nature, one may have to restart the app after turning this option on for full results.
Are you sure you want to clear all {0} directories from list?
Error: The Download Directory is not properly set.
Message will send on connection re-establishment
Kann nicht {0} durchsuchen, da der Benutzer offline ist.
Failed to browse {0} due to unspecified error.
User, {0}, is sharing only an empty directory.
Get Folder does not work for Locked Shares. Must use Browse or Browse At Location instead.
Successfully Parsed! Tap Next to Proceed
Failed to Parse File. Please ensure file is valid. Contact developer for more help.
Failed to Parse File. {0}. Contact developer for more help.
Select the following user notes to add
Permissions Issue opening Shared Folder. Please go into settings and reselect Shared Folder.
Issue accessing shared folders. Tap folders for more info.

Using this wizard one can import client data from SoulseekQT or Nicotine+.

To obtain client data from SoulseekQT go to Options > Extras > 'Export Client Configuration Data', the file type should be .scd1. For Nicotine+ go to Preferences > Export, the file type can be .tar.bz2 or the raw config file.

Seeker will import User List, Ignored / Unshared List, Wishlist, and User Notes. One will be able to pick and choose what to export in the following screens.

Tap 'Import' to get started.
Do not create Subfolders for Single Downloads
Show Private (Locked) Files in Search Results
Show Private (Locked) Files in Browse Response
Auto-Retry Failed Downloads When User Goes Back Online
Automatically Set Status to Away on Inactivity
No Shared Folders. Tap \'Add\' to get started.
Pause Sharing if on Metered (Mobile) Connection
Browse Public Shares or User List shares?
{0} zusätzliche Dateien seit dem letzten Scan.
Eine zusätzliche Datei seit dem letzten Scan.
No access to media store. Parsing will be unoptimized.
Cannot set directory without proper permissions
Must be logged in and connected to import data.
Must be logged in and connected to retry download.
Failed: Download directory not properly set.
Export User List, Ignore/Block List, User Notes, and Wishlist to xml. Useful for backing up or migrating data to new phone.
Permission has already been succesfully granted
Must be logged in to perform this action
Must be logged in to change password

Es ist ein Fehler aufgetreten. 

Bitte erwägen Sie einen Bericht an den Entwickler zu senden. 

Alle Informationen über die Schritte und Bedingungen, die zu diesem Problem führen, sind sehr hilfreich.
